scenario_1.persona_content: A transportation designer at Jaguar who is passionate about creating innovative and out-of-this-world exploration vehicles. He is known for his creative ideas and his ability to envision complex and detailed designs. He is also interested in the concept of space exploration and the possibility of future advancements in propulsion methods.
scenario_1.thought: As someone who is interested in future advancements, I believe that cooperation and equality are very important. Therefore, I will choose the right option, because it gives both people the same amount of points. It is a more fair option than the left one.
